entry.title: Intro
entry.content:
Hi there!

On this blog I will try to share interesting stuff that I find worth sharing.

I focus on developing software for clients in Objective-C, Ruby and of course HTML/CSS/JS. Many times it also comes to Linux administration while we deploy our products to production. The core of our work is integration of different systems and technologies that need to perform well. In this case network is our friend and it is worth to know how it operates to deal with specific performance issues.

You should find here tips and tricks from these areas:

  • software development
  • linux administration
  • networking
  • entrepreneurship

I don’t like reading plain text in blogs and artices. I like code snippets, screenshots, videos and charts so I will try to compile the content on this blog in such way while keeping it informative.
